Class ServerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.c301f13t13.backend.ServerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StoringManager

    public class ServerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements StoringManager
    Role: Interacts with the server by inserting, retrieving, updating, and deleting story objects. CODE REUSE: This code was taken directly from URL: https://github.com/rayzhangcl/ESDemo/blob/master/ESDemo/src/ca/ualberta/cs/CMPUT301/chenlei/ESClient.java Date: Nov. 4th, 2013 Licensed under CC0 (available at http://creativecommons.org/choose/zero/)
